name: Split Menace
description:
Synopsis

One player plays a survivor trapped in an enclosed facility, and the other plays a demon roaming the halls. The survivor must build up a statue to escape, but the two players swap roles every minute!

Information

This is a split-screen game played with two players. One player uses the keyboard and the other the mouse; both offer the same controls. Fullscreen is highly recommended (F5).

This game was made to test out my split-screen script I'd been working on. Hope you enjoy.

F5 to toggle fullscreen. F6 to change window size.
